result.translation: Bityo Allah amuhana by’intangarugero kubera icyaha cya nyuma (yakoze) n’icya mbere.[1]
result.footnotes: [1] Icyaha cyo kuba Farawo yaravuze ko ari we Nyagasani w’ikirenga, nk’uko byavuzwe muri iki gice (Surat), umurongo wacyo wa 24. Naho icya mbere ni ukuba yarabwiye ibyegera bye ko atazi ko bafite indi mana itari we nk’uko byavuzwe mu gice (Surat) cya 28, umurongo wacyo wa 38.
